definition: variant of 賜予|赐予[ci4 yu3]
to award (a prize)/to confer on sb/to confer upon by authority
select the best people for promotion
work or plans left as a legacy/the views of the departed/posthumous orders or teachings
to promulgate/to send out/to issue/to grant or confer
